column4: IGNORE MEAL 1 + 2 rows in each scenario. Read below for rules
1. After app Calculate daily macros (based on Lose, Maintain or Gain Weight) and use these percentages based on endurance v. power; intense v. moderate
2. Percentages only apply for pre meal, pre snack, and post snack
3. Remaining Macros are distributed evenly across other meals and snacks at 2:1 ratio
